analysis:

Composition centers text blocks and bullet points for quick scannabilityâ€”like a product spec sheet.

2) CULTURAL MEANING: The slide sells values of scientific credibility (ç§‘æ™®), convenience, and sensory qualityâ€”thinness, thermal conduction, self-lubricationâ€”appealing to pragmatic, quality-conscious consumers. 3) TABOO NAVIGATION: Potentially sensitive topics (intimate/sexual products implied by material discussion) are depersonalized through clinical language, "ç§‘æ™®" framing, and focus on material properties, turning embarrassment into objective information and reducing stigma.
